attributes.additional_details:
The UK Child benefits need to change. In Holland they pay for no more than 3 children and benefits are paid at the rates of that Country where the child lives.
Example:- Poland 3 childen get £10 in the UK its £50
A differential of £40 (no tax) allows a foreign worker to take a low paid job, consequently depriving a UK citizen of work, this in turn costs the UK tax payer Millions £ in dole payouts. To introduce the Dutch model would give British workers a level playing field. Solving many other problems of which we are well aware.
